# References

# Geometries

# sphere

float sphere( vec3 p, float size )

# Example

float map(vec3 p) {
	return sphere(p, 0.3);
}

# box

flat box(vec3 p, vec3 dimensions)

# Example

float map(vec3 p) {
	return box(p, vec3(0.3, 0.3, 0.3));
}

# roundedBox

flat roundedBox(vec3 p, vec3 dimensions, float roundness)

# Example

float map(vec3 p) {
	return box(p, vec3(0.3, 0.3, 0.3), 0.2);
}
